properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE DELETE_STATUS='N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_DATE, MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_STATUS='N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_DATE, MEMBER_ID ,ATTACHMENT_NAME, ATTACHMENT_PATH FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_STATUS='N' AND WITHDRAW_STATUS ='N' AND BOARD_NO=?
